summary: This document is a collection of passenger manifests for flights operated by JEGE, INC. (aircraft N908JE, a Boeing 727-31) and HYPERION AIR, INC. (aircraft N909JE, a Gulfstream G-1159B) during 2004 and 2005. The manifests list passengers, pilots, flight engineers, routes, and flight details for numerous trips, primarily involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, along with other recurring passengers and crew.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as a passenger on the vast majority of flights in both the JEGE and HYPERION manifests throughout 2004 and 2005.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Frequently listed as a passenger alongside Jeffrey Epstein on many flights in both the JEGE and HYPERION manifests.

persons.name: Dave Rodgers
persons.context: Listed as a pilot on nearly all flights for both JEGE, INC. (N908JE) and HYPERION AIR, INC. (N909JE).

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Listed as a pilot alongside Dave Rodgers on the vast majority of flights for both aircraft.

persons.name: Larry Morrison
persons.context: Listed as the flight engineer on nearly all flights for both JEGE, INC. (N908JE) and HYPERION AIR, INC. (N909JE).

persons.name: Brent Tindall
persons.context: Recurring passenger listed on several flights, often alongside Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: David Mullen
persons.context: Listed as a passenger on several HYPERION AIR flights in 2005.

persons.name: Sean Luc
persons.context: Listed as a passenger on a few early 2004 HYPERION AIR flights.

persons.name: Bill Hammond
persons.context: Appears as a pilot on some HYPERION AIR manifests in late 2005, sometimes replacing Dave Rodgers.

persons.name: Frank Gamble
persons.context: Listed as a passenger on one JEGE manifest (EFTA00066613).

persons.name: Gary
persons.context: Name appears on a few manifests (e.g., EFTA00066610, EFTA00066690) but role is unclear; listed in passenger or crew field.

connections.description: Frequently listed together as passengers on the same flights.
Rodgers is the pilot for Epstein's private aircraft on numerous flights.
Visoski is the pilot for Epstein's private aircraft on numerous flights.
Morrison is the flight engineer for Epstein's private aircraft on numerous flights.
Tindall is a recurring passenger on flights with Epstein.
Listed together as pilots on the vast majority of flights.
Rodgers (pilot) and Morrison (flight engineer) are consistently part of the same flight crew.

events.title: Extensive Private Air Travel
events.description: Hundreds of flights recorded for aircraft N908JE (Boeing 727) and N909JE (Gulfstream) operated by JEGE, INC. and HYPERION AIR, INC., primarily for Jeffrey Epstein and associates.

events.title: Flight from St. Thomas to West Palm Beach
events.description: HYPERION AIR flight N909JE from St. Thomas, USVI to West Palm Beach, FL, with passengers Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and Brent Tindall.

events.title: Flight from New Jersey to Massachusetts to St. Thomas
events.description: HYPERION AIR flight N909JE from New Jersey to Massachusetts, then to St. Thomas, as per the summary list.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell were frequent passengers on private flights operated by JEGE, INC. and HYPERION AIR, INC. throughout 2004 and 2005.
The primary aircraft were a Boeing 727-31 (tail number N908JE) and a Gulfstream G-1159B (tail number N909JE).
The flight crews were remarkably consistent, with pilots Dave Rodgers and Larry Visoski, and flight engineer Larry Morrison appearing on the vast majority of manifests.
Flights connected numerous locations including New York, Florida, the US Virgin Islands, the Caribbean, Europe, and various US resort destinations.
Other recurring passengers included Brent Tindall and, in 2005, David Mullen.
